content:
# The current inventory confirms that I have no Iron Ore left, which explains why I couldn't insert it into the Stone Furnace. 
# The Stone Furnace is currently reporting "NO INGREDIENTS," indicating it cannot operate without the required Iron Ore.

# To resolve this, I will need to locate the nearest Iron Ore resource patch and harvest some Iron Ore to continue the smelting process.

# Let's find the nearest Iron Ore patch and move to it for harvesting.
nearest_iron_patch = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Get the position of the nearest Iron Ore patch.
move_to(nearest_iron_patch)  # Move to that position to harvest Iron Ore.

# After moving to the Iron Ore patch, I will harvest a reasonable amount of Iron Ore, aiming for around 10 units.
harvested_iron_amount = harvest_resource(nearest_iron_patch, quantity=10)  # Harvesting 10 units of Iron Ore from the patch.

# After harvesting the Iron Ore, I will check my inventory again to confirm the amount of Iron Ore I have now.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting Iron Ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking inventory after harvesting.
